title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 310: Featuring Allan Walsh + Glen Metropolit
description:
On Episode 310 of Spittin’ Chiclets, the guys are joined by Allan Walsh and Glen Metropolit. Allan joined (21:59) to discuss the CBA, the NHL returning to play, his relationship with Gary Bettman, Marc-Andre Fleury and tons more. The guys then hear about Whit’s worst day ever while RA records from a fans house. The boys also discuss the new divisions for next season and the January 13th start date. Metro then joined (01:20:05) to talk about his career, his crazy path to the NHL, playing overseas and more.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/schiclets
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
